topic.description: The MQTT topic on which the message is published.

payload.description: A UTF8 string to encapsulate in the telemetry payload; if null, omit payload from telemetry message.

bypass-serialization.description: Bypass serializing the payload and just embed raw bytes.

content-type.description: The value of the ContentType header in the message, or null if no such header.

format-indicator.description: The value of the PayloadFormatIndicator header in the message, or null if no such header.

metadata.description: Keys and values for header fields in the message.

message-expiry.description: Maximum duration for which a response remains desired by the sender.

sender-index.description: An arbitrary numeric value used to identify the TelemetrySender that sent the telemetry; null omits sender ID in header.

packet-index.description: An arbitrary numeric value used to identify the packet ID in the message.
